title: Mana Yatri: Bike, Auto & Cabs
description:
Available in Hyderabad & Warangal, Mana Yatri is a community initiative that provides hassle-free bike-taxi, auto & cab booking experience for its customers. Built with feedback from drivers & customers, the app strives to build a sustainable, long-term, and transparent mobility solution. Whether it's an easy commute to the office or a quick pick-up for a weekend hangout, Mana Yatri has got you covered with its bike taxis, autos, & cabs!

The Mana Yatri Difference

Mana Yatri charges its driver zero commission! This means you pay less and the driver earns more - it’s magic!

100% payment goes directly to the driver without any cuts or any middlemen
It is brought to you India’s most ❤️app by drivers and customers alike - Namma Yatri.
We only assign trips to drivers close by so you get lightning-fast bookings and your assigned driver reaches your location in no time
Our drivers are super happy and hence there are low cancellations thereby providing you happy rides
All our data is 100% Open. Check it out at manayatri.in/open

Booking bike taxis, autos, & cabs has never been this easy & hassle-free!

How to book a ride through Mana Yatri ride booking app

✅ Download Mana Yatri: Bike, Auto & Cabs app
✅ Signup on the app with your phone number
✅ Pick your drop location and then confirm your pickup location
✅ Choose your driver or let us assign the nearest driver
✅ Start your ride
✅ Pay the driver directly through cash or UPI, at the end of the trip

Feature highlights

🏍️🛺🚕 Quick and easy booking: Install - Signup - Book- Pay & Repeat, you can book a ride to come at your doorstep.
🏍️🛺🚕 Fast, Easy & Safe: Find a ride easily with a few taps on your mobile and enjoy a hassle-free ride.
🏍️🛺🚕 Choose your Driver or let us assign: The choice is yours! You can choose from the best-rated drivers available near you, or let us choose the nearest ride available.
🏍️🛺🚕 Save your favorite locations: You no longer need to set the location every time you book a ride; you can pick it up from your marked locations without hassle.
🏍️🛺🚕 Repeat Ride: Book your office ride every day without hassle. Click on "Repeat ride" instead of entering your pickup and drop location all over again.
🏍️🛺🚕 Navigation and Real-time tracking: Track your Ride in real-time and know exactly when your auto will arrive and where you're commuting with the best-in-class maps technology.
🏍️🛺🚕 Affordable fares: Our fares are fair and affordable, so you don't have to worry about overpaying for your Ride. No haggling. No bargaining. No waste of time.
🏍️🛺🚕 Consistent Pricing: No surge pricing across different locations.
🏍️🛺🚕 Direct Payment: Pay directly to the Driver in cash or UPI.
🏍️🛺🚕 100% Transparency: No hidden charges; you can check the rate card to know the breakdown of your Ride. Rate the Ride and give feedback for improvement.
🏍️🛺🚕 Multiple languages to choose from – Access Mana Yatri in English, Telugu, Hindi, Kannada & Tamil.

Follow us on our social media platforms and stay updated:
Instagram: https://instagram.com/mana.yatri
Twitter: https://twitter.com/manayatri
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@manayatri
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/people/Mana-Yatri/61556695470475/

Get to know more about us at https://www.manayatri.in/.

summary: 0% commission ride booking app for lowest price bike taxi, auto & cab rides
